title: Oracle's Chamber Adventure #8
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Oracle's Antechamber
rooms.description: A circular chamber lit by floating orbs of pale blue light. Ancient tapestries depicting prophetic visions hang on the stone walls. The air shimmers with residual magic. Incense smoke curls upward from bronze braziers, filling the room with the scent of myrrh and sage.

items.name: stone altar
items.description: A weathered altar carved with mystical symbols and celestial patterns

items.name: glowing crystal shard
items.description: A fragment of crystal that pulses with inner light

items.name: prophecy cabinet
items.description: An ornate wooden cabinet with three drawers, each marked with a different celestial symbol

items.name: First Prophecy scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll written in flowing script
items.text: The First Prophecy: In the year when three sevens align, the Oracle spoke her first vision. The Seer of Delphi was her name, and she foretold the coming of heroes. Remember: 777.

items.name: ornate locked chest
items.description: A chest decorated with mother-of-pearl inlays and mystical runes

items.name: Second Prophecy scroll
items.description: A scroll sealed with golden wax
items.text: The Second Prophecy: The Oracle's wisdom flows from the sacred spring of Delphi. She who sees beyond the veil guards the path to truth. Only those who know her name and her source may proceed.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A delicate key made of tarnished silver with mystical engravings

items.name: tapestry of past visions
items.description: A tapestry showing scenes of ancient prophecies coming true
items.text: The tapestry depicts the Oracle of Delphi speaking prophecies that shaped kingdoms. Beneath it reads: 'She who drinks from the sacred spring sees all.'

items.name: bronze door
items.description: A heavy door engraved with images of seers and prophets. It leads deeper into the Oracle's domain.

rooms.name: Hall of Visions
rooms.description: A long hallway lined with mirrors that reflect not your image, but glimpses of possible futures. Crystalline pillars support the vaulted ceiling. Three pedestals stand in the center, each holding a different artifact. The walls are covered with inscriptions in ancient languages.

items.name: pedestal of wisdom
items.description: A marble pedestal holding a golden chalice
items.text: Inscription: 'The Chalice of Wisdom - From this vessel, the Oracle drinks the waters of the sacred spring to gain her sight.'

items.name: pedestal of truth
items.description: A jade pedestal displaying an ancient tome
items.text: Inscription: 'The Book of Truth - Within these pages lie the names of all who have sought the Oracle's counsel. The greatest seers are remembered: Pythia, Cassandra, and the Seer of Delphi.'

items.name: pedestal of sight
items.description: An obsidian pedestal supporting a crystal orb
items.text: Inscription: 'The Orb of Sight - Through this sphere, one may glimpse the threads of fate that bind all things.'

items.name: scroll rack
items.description: A wooden rack holding numerous ancient scrolls

items.name: Third Prophecy scroll
items.description: A scroll bound with golden thread
items.text: The Third Prophecy: To enter the Inner Sanctum where the Oracle dwells, you must prove your knowledge. Answer truly: What is the Oracle's title? From what source does her power flow? In what sacred place does she reside?

items.name: offering bowl
items.description: A silver bowl filled with precious gems and coins left by past seekers

items.name: ancient golden coin
items.description: A coin stamped with the image of the Oracle's temple

items.name: sanctum door
items.description: A magnificent door carved from a single piece of white marble. Three questions are inscribed upon its surface in glowing script.

password_questions.question: What is the Oracle's title?
password_questions.hint: Check the First Prophecy scroll and the Book of Truth

password_questions.question: From what source does her power flow?
password_questions.hint: The Second Prophecy and the tapestry mention this

password_questions.question: In what sacred place does she reside?
password_questions.hint: Multiple scrolls and inscriptions reference this location

rooms.name: Oracle's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the Oracle's Chamber! A magnificent room bathed in ethereal light. In the center, a pool of crystal-clear water bubbles up from the sacred spring. Above it, a spectral figure of the Oracle appears, her eyes glowing with ancient wisdom. She nods in approval as you enter, and a portal of shimmering light opens behind her, offering your escape.

items.name: sacred spring
items.description: The legendary spring of prophecy, its waters glowing with mystical energy

items.name: spirit of the Oracle
items.description: The ethereal form of the ancient Oracle, radiating wisdom and power
items.text: The Oracle speaks: 'You have proven yourself worthy by solving the mysteries of my chamber. Your wisdom and perseverance have earned you passage. Go now, and carry the knowledge you have gained.'

items.name: throne of prophecy
items.description: An ornate throne where the Oracle once sat to deliver her visions

rooms.win_message: The Oracle's spirit blesses you as you step through the shimmering portal. You have successfully navigated the mysteries of the Oracle's Chamber and gained her wisdom. The portal carries you safely away, your mind filled with newfound knowledge. You win!
